abstract: Confirming recent rumors, the activist investor Carl C. Icahn disclosed Tuesday in a regulatory filing that his investment firm had acquired 3.92 million shares of Kraft Foods, a holding valued at about $138.2 million as of June 30.
lead_paragraph: Confirming recent rumors, the activist investor Carl C. Icahn disclosed Tuesday in a regulatory filing that his investment firm had acquired 3.92 million shares of Kraft Foods, a holding valued at about $138.2 million as of June 30.
